Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1500000 to you. I understand your financial considerations, and after careful evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1350000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this price reflects the quality and significance of the product, and I hope it aligns with your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
